title: Maker-Based Experiential Language Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Course for pre-service and in-service teachers to experience maker education philosophy and its integration with language pedagogy.

learning_goals: Design three or more specific instructional strategies for applying maker education principles to language classes
Produce one language-learning tool using digital fabrication tools (3D modeling, laser cutting, etc.)
Develop open-ended tasks that promote learners' creativity and critical thinking through maker activities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
